ygData.subject: Re: Marnek Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: just a suggestion.... dont think i can spare that kinda time also... since i only get to play EQ once a week... n perhaps occasionally 1 overntie game... ...
ygData.messageBody:
just a suggestion.... dont think i can spare that kinda time also... since i
only get to play EQ once a week... n perhaps occasionally 1 overntie game...
:) perhaps leave to those thast having holidays... *hint hint*...

Nic
